> @@ -14,6 +14,7 @@
>        "/etc/ssl/certs/ca-**certificates.crt", // Linux etc

>        "/etc/ssl/ca-bundle.pem",             // OpenSUSE
> +       "/etc/ssl/cert.pem",                  // OpenBSD
